website_summaries.verdict: With a fabric that conforms, this jacket is a favorite for all sizes.
pros: Comes in multiple colors and fits, this jacket is a favorite for those who live in moderate to cold climates
We love the microfleece lining that isn't' available in other similar counterparts
Plenty of room in terms of fit, and easy to throw a sweatshirt under
cons: Runs rather large for most but is easy to layer with most sizes

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat small around the hip.
customer_reviews.text: A little too small around the hips....but that's my fault. For the rest...it works perfectly...and fit like a glove. I’m a big chest girl...34DDD and I asked for a Medium size (one size smaller than I usually ask for....I was following the recommendation of another reviewer. I’m happy with that decision). Is ok...as you can see at the picture, just that little detail around the hip (too tite) It comes with the adjustment cordes at the hip level (mine is at maximum). Also it has velcro around the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: fahitachine

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with great fit
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was two days late which was a disappointment but the jacket is very nice. Good quality and should keep me relatively warm in cooler temps. Fleece Lining is very soft but on the thinner side. I wear a size 6 typically and a small fits perfectly. Sleeve length is also great for my arms. I’m 5’10 and it hits mid hip. Red color was more subdued then in the pictures as well, but it is a true red. The jacket I received differs slightly from shown pictures. The zippered hand pockets have a black quarter inch outline surrounding the zipper, but it’s not a deal breaker for me. Interior has two open top pockets in the lining as well.
customer_reviews.author: P. Osterhous

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. This past weekend I was walking for a mile in 40 degree sideways rain, and I wasn't cold and the water came right off. I have a 42" bust so I ordered the XL and it fits great. I didn't want super tight fitting, and I actually have room to wear a sweater or hoody underneath. Considering buying in a second color 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Tyler J Abbs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the spring and fall
customer_reviews.text: I really like this jacket. I'm 5'3 135lbs and I got a small. There is plenty of room to wear a hoodie under the jacket. It really is a good medium weight jacket for the fall and spring. It is windproof in that you're not going to get a draft due to the material, this also makes it water resistant too. The collar is really nice on, it isn't too lose or too tight when fully zipped. Overall it is a really good jacket.
customer_reviews.author: A. Boone

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well designed and well made jacket...I love the fabric, which is substantial and stretchy on the outside (water resistant and a good windbreaker) and the microfleece lining (which is black on the black jacket). Fit is true to size and flattering. The MSRP on the tag is $199. The only downside that I can see is that it is NOT lightweight...I probably won't use it much when I travel by plane because it would take up too much space and weigh too much in a suitcase. However, it will be great to use at home and on car trips.
customer_reviews.author: abqbev

customer_reviews.title: keeps me snugly warm in 40 degree am weather
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for my AM cycling rides during colder season. Velcro on sleeves for keeping out the wind is perfect. don't let the cold weather mess up your fitness schedule LOVE AND WILL BUY THE PURPLE ONE AS WELL. SEE U ON THE BIKE PATH WHOOT WHOOT
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Fine

customer_reviews.title: A great choice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a top layer for winter snow sports (fat biking, hiking/snowshoeing). It's absolutely perfect for that. The hip length is ideal, doesn't get in the way of gear or body movement. I found the Large to fit true to size for a jacket, which includes room for a shirt and light jacket/sweatshirt layer underneath. It's also really soft and comfy to wear. If you're looking for a bargain priced equivalent to something you'd find at REI, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Waitz

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket but too large
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice jacket with several features and the only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is becasue it was too long. Other than that the features of this compare to other more expensive brands and for the price this is a very competitive jacket. I wish they could have other models and shorter in the length so I could try it, but if you like the length you won't get disappointed with this good jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Splendid

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket but you have to get one size smaller than u normally wear. Returning
customer_reviews.author: GEORGIA

customer_reviews.title: Warm, fits very well. Red Size Small
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great, warm, the only thing is the color was more light red than the picture. I thought was dark cherry. I like it anyway. The zipper doesn't run. As smoothly as the YYK metallic this one is plasticized. The neck area doesn't fit me well. Is a little loose however it will leave room for scarf or hoodie garment underneath or a baclava. So yes I'm keeping it. I like the material is sturdy, light, warm. I'm petite 5'3" and 138 lbs. Ordered small. Fits perfect. Very happy with my purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: rubi david

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket!!! I am always cold at work and I wear it as a scrub jacket since I wear navy and the material is water restaurant. However, the color isn’t a true navy, it’s coloring is so dark it almost appears dark grey or black. It is very warm and even Kees me warm when i wear it out on fairly chilly days
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: While I thought this would be a cheap jacket it has turned out to be very nice. Keeps the snow and wind at bay. Shoveled snow for an hour and was warm (wearing layers underneath) and dry. Pleasantly surprised. Fits as expected. Like the toggles at the bottom. Big pockets! Finally someone realizes women carry things in pockets. Good buy for a walking/excersize jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good water resistant jacket
customer_reviews.text: Good quality rain resistant jacket. Had soft fleece inside. I got a size small (I'm small chested and have 29 inch waist) and was hoping was more fitted. Overall a good jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Collette E. Tardiff

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made jacket and I really like the style, but it runs large and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: jmore61

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price. Nice length
customer_reviews.text: I like this jacket because it’s longer than most of this type. Clearly not the best quality control: the waste seaming at the zipper are off about 1/4 inch.
customer_reviews.author: maiden voyager

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice jacket. I was unsure about the size, but I ordered a small (I’m 5’7 and 136 pounds). It fit great! Washed it in cold and hung it to dry. It washed up very well. Good pockets and adjustable sleeve openings at the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: DogLuvr36

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Good quality. A bit bigger than what I expected but that's ok if you are wearing a sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Amherst

customer_reviews.title: The color of the jacket is very nice and it is a well-made jacket for the price
customer_reviews.text: The color of the jacket is very nice and it is a well-made jacket for the price. It fits like a medium on me and I ordered a small. Overall nice color and material. Runs large.
customer_reviews.author: AwesomeD

customer_reviews.title: Touch Big
customer_reviews.text: Just a touch too big.. nice though. It will be fine with a thick sweatshirt underneath
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Fit slightly off
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color, price and quality!! Only returned bc it was too large. I am 4"11 and ordered a small. It was too long in the sleeves and too wide around the torso. Other than that, great jacket!
customer_reviews.author: runner girl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is awesome-it was thick enough to withstand wind, but it was too small around the middle for me (mommy tummy), so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: rathkekje

customer_reviews.title: great jacket
customer_reviews.text: love it, if your thinking about doing it, do it!!! great jacket, i use riding my motorcycle during this time of the year and its great.
customer_reviews.author: unity malloy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted this for granddaughter. Should have ordered a size larger
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Cane

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is great for running. It keeps me warm but not too hot. Love the color- very bright and vibrant but not overpowering or ugly.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.text: I am wearing a small, which i will keep, although I wish they had an extra small. I have long arms, but the sleeves are long enough. It seems to be high quality and exactly what I was looking for, which makes it a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kcs

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable jacket with slightly roomy fit
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable jacket with a slightly roomy fit. Thought size Small was going to be a bit more form-fitting but it allows for layering. Pretty color. Great for variable temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Liked the material and looks of jacket. Not for woman with alittle of a tummy though..... go up a size if ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality is just as good as the more expensive brands. Fit true to size. I'm 5'4 about 140lbs and ordered a medium. There's plenty of room to layer underneath and still be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Powell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We used these jackets for our state championship jackets. They are great
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Y Coursen

customer_reviews.title: Really cute, but runs small.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is adorable, as I unboxed it my husband even commented on its style...but it runs small....order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great deal here.
customer_reviews.text: Everything a woman needs in a jacket for a summer night of camping ⛺️ or a chilly day at the lake. Look no farther.
customer_reviews.author: Vince C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice light weight jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love my pink jacket. Fits perfect. Love the bright hot pink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but it took forever to get to me! But worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy love

customer_reviews.title: Really really nice !!️!!️👍👍👍Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this jacket 😍😍!!️ Very comfortable , fits as expected.. really the one I was looking for 👍👍!!️
customer_reviews.author: javier trias

customer_reviews.title: Item runs very small!!
customer_reviews.text: Product ordered as medium runs very small. Item returned. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Edward S. Curran, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket, very comfortable, light weight and works for an easy grab on the way out the door.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear88

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking jacket. Nice weight. Will definitely get a lot of wear!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Malon

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little looser than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Good quality.Less fashionable if it fits loose. Close fit looks smart. Won't send back because the looser fit allows me to use like a car coat and fit a rigger ling garmment.
customer_reviews.author: SHE

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my jacket, very comfy & great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Perez

customer_reviews.title: Best value!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit Wonderful color and covers the hips Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket, wrong color for me
customer_reviews.text: The jacket came quickly. The quality seemed good. It hit me at the mid-lower hip. The size was good but would have been a bit tight if I had on a really bulky sweater. (125lbs 34C, size small) I returned it only because the color was atrocious on me. It had an orangey undertone that doesn't work with my pale skin and very light hair. the color would probably not be a problem for 90% of people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it’s very cute and warm would recommend just get the right size
customer_reviews.text: Gave a 4/5 because of the size chart, other than it not fitting, it’s very cute and warm would recommend just get the right size lol
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Navarrete

product_meta.title: Wantdo Women's Windproof Softshell Jacket Insulated Spring Autumn Windbreaker
feature_bullets: Material: 95% Polyester, 5% Spandex; with brushed fleece interior
Wind resistant: Easy to deal with wind, warm and breathable
Design: Standing collar, Front zip with chin guard, Stretch fabric for maximum movement and comfort
Features: Adjustable cuffs & elastic hem, 2 zippered hand pockets, great for money, keys, phone, wallet, passport etc
Occasion: Great choice for Outdoor Sports, Cycling, Hiking, Mountaineering, Climbing, Shooting, Fishing, Riding, Hunting, Driving, Bowling and Camping, Travelling and Adventure
Application: All-season piece with an active fit built to keep you protected in milder weather and layer under shells and jackets for bonus warmth in more severe conditions
